original_title: John Bunyan:  The Journey of a Pilgrim
overview: A look at the man who wrote The Pilgrim's Progress, the most circulated book of all time, next to the Bible. This documentary, filmed at the John Bunyan Museum in Bedford, England, presents a fascinating look at the life of John Bunyan, chronicled by Bunyan expert John Pestell, author of Travel with John Bunyan.
tagline: A look at the man who wrote The Pilgrim's Progress
title: John Bunyan:  The Journey of a Pilgrim
